00030 size_t RangeState::encoded_length() {
00031   return 9 + timestamp.encoded_length() + encoded_length_vstr(transfer_log) +
00032     encoded_length_vstr(split_point) + encoded_length_vstr(old_start_row);
00033 }
00034 
00035 
00036 void RangeState::encode(uint8_t **bufp) {
00037   *(*bufp)++ = state;
00038   timestamp.encode(bufp);
00039   encode_i64(bufp, soft_limit);
00040   encode_vstr(bufp, transfer_log);
00041   encode_vstr(bufp, split_point);
00042   encode_vstr(bufp, old_start_row);
00043 }
00044 
00045 
00046 void RangeState::decode(const uint8_t **bufp, size_t *remainp) {
00047   HT_TRY("decoding range state",
00048     state = decode_byte(bufp, remainp);
00049     timestamp.decode(bufp, remainp);
00050     soft_limit = decode_i64(bufp, remainp);
00051     transfer_log = decode_vstr(bufp, remainp);
00052     split_point = decode_vstr(bufp, remainp);
00053     old_start_row = decode_vstr(bufp, remainp));
00054 
00055 }
00056 
00057 std::ostream& Hypertable::operator<<(std::ostream &out, const RangeState &st) {
00058   out <<"{RangeState: state=";
00059 
00060   switch (st.state) {
00061   case RangeState::STEADY: out <<"STEADY";              break;
00062   case RangeState::SPLIT_LOG_INSTALLED: out <<"SLI";    break;
00063   case RangeState::SPLIT_SHRUNK: out <<"SHRUNK";        break;
00064   default:
00065     out <<"unknown ("<< st.state;
00066   }
00067   out << " ts.logical=" << st.timestamp.logical << " ts.real=" << st.timestamp.real;
00068   out <<" soft_limit="<< st.soft_limit;
00069   if (st.transfer_log)
00070     out <<" transfer_log='"<< st.transfer_log << "'";
00071   if (st.split_point)
00072     out <<" split_point='"<< st.split_point << "'";
00073   if (st.old_start_row)
00074     out <<" old_start_row='"<< st.old_start_row << "'";
00075   out <<"}";
00076   return out;
00077 }
